headline: Is Dominion Energy (D) One of the Best Utility Stocks to Buy for Dividends?
summary: Dominion Energy, Inc. (NYSE:D) is included among the 12 Best Utility Stocks to Buy for Dividends. Dominion Energy, Inc. (NYSE:D) provides regulated electricity service to 3.6 million homes and businesses in Virginia, North Carolina, and South Carolina, and regulated natural gas service to 500,000 customers in South Carolina.
